message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle, but I'll take a bit more this time
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly better deal this time
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small advantage, but I'm not going to get left with nothing
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
You're getting close to desperation, I'll give you a small chance to get something, but I'm not going to get left with almost nothing
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up without a fight
